descriptions: Demonstrates no understanding of cultural products related to the target culture.

Identifies and describes several cultural products, showing a basic understanding of their relevance.
Demonstrates a solid understanding of various cultural products and their significance within the target culture.
Exhibits a comprehensive understanding of cultural products, analyzing their impact and significance with nuanced insights.

Identifies and describes several cultural practices, showing a basic understanding of their relevance.
Demonstrates a solid understanding of various cultural practices and their significance within the target culture.
Exhibits a comprehensive understanding of cultural practices, analyzing their impact and significance with nuanced insights.
